# activeInteractionTypes

**Instance Property**

The types of interactions that a person actively performs.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final var activeInteractionTypes: ImageAnalysisInteraction.InteractionTypes { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is always a concrete type that’s never set to [doc://com.apple.VisionKit/documentation/VisionKit/ImageAnalysisInteraction/InteractionTypes/automatic].

## Configuring an image interaction

- **delegate**: The delegate that handles the interaction callbacks.
- **analysis**: The results of analyzing an image for items that people can interact with.
- **view**: The view that uses this interaction.
- **preferredInteractionTypes**: The types of interactions that people can perform with the image.
- **ImageAnalysisInteraction.InteractionTypes**: The types of interactions that people can perform with an image.
